cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on February 25, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1211, American Values and Security in International Athletics Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 34 (Tuesday, February 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCAUL:
H.R. 1211.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H587]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: American Values and Security in International Athletics Act
